tags.name: authorization-selector
tags.description: An element to render single authorization method from a list of defined methods

properties.name: onchange
properties.description: A function to be called when change event is dispatched

properties.name: type
properties.description: A type attribute value of selected authorization method.

properties.name: attrForLabel
properties.description:
An attrribute to use to read value for the lable to be rendered in the drop down when `type` property cannot be translated to a common name.

This attribute should be set on the child element.

events.name: change
events.description: Dispatched when method selection change or a method element dispatches change event (retargeting)

slots.description: Renders the authorization methods that has `type` property. Everything else ios rendered as is.
